static LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.dataset.SurfaceAlbedo.read ( Reader  inputFile,
int  scaling 
) [static] 

00034                                                                  {
00035         Scanner s = null;
00036         try {
00037             s = new Scanner(inputFile);
00038             
00039             // read header
00040             @SuppressWarnings("unused")
00041             String junk;
00042             junk = s.next(); String ellipsoid = s.next();
00043             junk = s.next(); String projection = s.next();
00044             if (! (ellipsoid.equals("WGS-84") && projection.equals("LAMBERT2SP"))){
00045                 throw new IllegalArgumentException("Expect data to be in LAMBERT2SP and WGS-84 not " + projection + " and " + ellipsoid);
00046             }
00047             junk = s.next(); double lat1 = s.nextDouble();
00048             junk = s.next(); double lat2 = s.nextDouble();
00049             junk = s.next(); double center_lat = s.nextDouble();
00050             junk = s.next(); double center_lon = s.nextDouble();
00051             junk = s.next(); double eastres = s.nextDouble(); // meters
00052             junk = s.next(); double northres = s.nextDouble();
00053             junk = s.next(); int nrows = s.nextInt();
00054             junk = s.next(); int ncols = s.nextInt();
00055             
00056             double center_northing = - nrows * 0.5 * northres;
00057             double center_easting = ncols * 0.5 * eastres;
00058             
00059             int missing = -999; // doesn't exist in the data
00060             
00061             // read in data (in Lambert projection)
00062             int[][] lamdata = new int[nrows][ncols];
00063             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00064                 for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00065                     try {
00066                         double value = s.nextDouble();
00067                         lamdata[i][j] = (int)(0.5 + value * scaling);
00068                     } catch (Exception e){
00069                         lamdata[i][j] = missing;
00070                     }
00071                 }
00072             }
00073             
00074             // Find grid extent
00075             LambertConformal2SP proj = new LambertConformal2SP(Ellipsoid.WGS84(), new LatLon(center_lat,center_lon), lat1, lat2, new LambertConformal2SP.Coord(center_northing, center_easting));
00076             double minlat = 180; double maxlat = -180;
00077             double minlon = 180; double maxlon = -180;
00078             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00079                 LambertConformal2SP.Coord lam = new LambertConformal2SP.Coord(-(i+0.5)*northres, (j+0.5)*eastres);
00080                 LatLon ll = proj.getLatLon(lam);
00081                 if ( ll.getLat() < minlat ) minlat = ll.getLat();
00082                 if ( ll.getLat() > maxlat ) maxlat = ll.getLat();
00083                 if ( ll.getLon() < minlon ) minlon = ll.getLon();
00084                 if ( ll.getLon() > maxlon ) maxlon = ll.getLon();
00085             }
00086             System.out.println("Grid extent: " + minlat + " " + minlon + " " + maxlat + " " + maxlon);
00087             
00088             // best latres, lonres
00089             int outrows = nrows;
00090             int outcols = ncols;
00091             double latres = (maxlat - minlat)/outrows;
00092             double lonres = (maxlon - minlon)/outcols;
00093             // lookup nearest neighbor in lat-lon space
00094             int[][] lldata = new int[outrows][outcols];
00095             for (int i=0; i < outrows; ++i){
00096                 double lat = maxlat - i * latres;
00097                 for (int j=0; j < outcols; ++j){
00098                     double lon = minlon + j * lonres;
00099                     LambertConformal2SP.Coord lam = proj.getLambert( new LatLon(lat,lon) );
00100                     double rowno = (0 - lam.northing)/northres; 
00101                     rowno = nrows - rowno - 1; // row=0 is southmost row
00102                     double colno = (lam.easting - 0)/eastres;
00103                     // lldata[i][j] = Remapper.nearestNeighbor(rowno, colno, lamdata, missing);
00104                     lldata[i][j] = Remapper.bilinearInterpolation(rowno, colno, lamdata, missing);
00105                 }
00106             }
00107             
00108             return new LatLonGrid(lldata, missing, new LatLon(maxlat,minlon), latres, lonres);
00109         } catch (Exception e){
00110             System.err.println("Error reading file: " + e);
00111             throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
00112         } finally {
00113             if (s != null) {
00114                 try{
00115                     s.close();
00116                 } catch (Exception e){
00117                     // okay
00118                 }
00119             }
00120         }
00121     }
